section_1.title_1: What is a TourCoin and how does it work?
section_1.text_1_1: TourCoin is a token on the decentralized Binance Smart Chain (BSC), specifically designed for the tourism industry. It is a type of digital currency that revolutionizes your travel experiences. Driven by blockchain technology and supported by the robust Binance network, it is used for purchases, payments, and value storage.
section_1.text_1_2: TourCoin gives you the freedom to explore the world in a unique and secure way.
section_1.text_2_1: Users can acquire TourCoin through cryptocurrency exchanges or directly from the PancakeSwap platform. Once acquired, TourCoin are stored in a digital wallet such as MetaMask.
section_1.text_2_2: By using TourCoin, travelers can enjoy an innovative approach to making payments and transactions in the tourism industry, providing a smoother and more rewarding experience. Travel, smile, and pay with TourCoin. Happiness is found in every TourCoin you own.

section_1_tutorials.small: We invite you to be part of the TourCoin ecosystem
section_1_tutorials.p_1: Welcome to TourCoin, where you can turn your travels into unforgettable moments! We are excited that you are joining our community of explorers and tourism enthusiasts. To start your journey with TourCoin, we recommend the following essential steps.
section_1_tutorials.text_1: Tutorial on how to create an account on Binance and download the app.
section_1_tutorials.text_2: Fund fiat currency on Binance and buy Bnb.
section_1_tutorials.text_3: Download the MetaMask wallet and load your TourCoin token.
section_1_tutorials.text_4: How to buy TourCoin (TRC) with Bnb.

section_1_services.p_1: These are our departments in Celso Ramos, Brazil.

section_2.p_1: TourCoin offers you the best benefits

card_1.title: Tokenization of Tangible Assets
card_1.text: Our company tokenizes tangible assets such as properties, tourism services, and commercial establishments. This allows investors to access investments in the thriving tourism sector in Celso Ramos, Brazil, in a more accessible and diversified way.

card_2.title: Transparency
card_2.text: Security tokens are issued on a blockchain, providing a public ledger. This ensures transparency in token management and allows investors to easily audit transactions and share issuances.

card_3.title: Appreciation
card_3.text: The growing demand for TourCoin in the tourism sector may result in potential appreciation of the same, offering attractive investment opportunities.

card_4.title: Borderless Travel
card_4.text: Traveling has never been easier! TourCoin eliminates barriers in international payments, allowing you to enjoy your travels without worrying about exchange rates and bank fees.

card_5.title: Discounts
card_5.text: Simply load your TourCoin into your digital wallet and unlock a wide range of travel experiences. Use your coins with our partnerships and enjoy exclusive discounts.

card_6.title: Voting Rights and Dividends
card_6.text: Our security tokens can be designed to grant investors voting rights and dividends, similar to common stocks. This gives investors an active role in business decisions and potential regular income streams.

section_3.title: A glimpse into the future
section_3.text_1: Facilitating happy and worry-free travel experiences by offering TourCoin to people. We want to be the key that unlocks unforgettable moments and smiles at every destination.
section_3.text_2: Revitalizing joy in travel through TourCoin, becoming the currency of happiness for exploring the world.
section_3.text_3_1: ✔ Happiness First: We place the traveler's joy at the center of our actions.
section_3.text_3_2: ✔ Financial Empowerment: We provide freedom and happiness through secure and transparent transactions.
section_3.text_3_3: ✔ Human Connection: We seek to enrich people's lives by connecting them with authentic experiences.

section_4.title: Some lived experiences
section_4.p_1: We offer agile and personalized attention, supported by the experience and technical capacity of a specialized team.

section_5.title: TourCoin release date
section_5.p_1: TourCoin will officially go on sale on April 5th at 9:00 PM.
section_5.p_2: Happiness is found in every TourCoin you own! Experience innovative and exciting journeys with our tokens. With TourCoin, the whole world is at your fingertips. Invest in your happiness and explore new horizons with us! #UnlimitedTravel #InnovativeTravel

section_6.title: Tutorial on how to buy TourCoin
section_6.p_1: Welcome to TourCoin, turns your travels into unforgettable moments! We are excited to have you join our community of explorers and tourism enthusiasts. To start your journey with TourCoin, we recommend two essential steps.
section_6.text_1: Download the recommended wallet MetaMask for security and easy management of TourCoin. We suggest downloading the MetaMask wallet. This digital wallet gives you full control over your assets and facilitates transactions. Below, you will find a video on how to install MetaMask.
section_6.text_2: Now that you have your MetaMask wallet, it's time to acquire TourCoin. We use PancakeSwap, a secure and efficient platform for exchanging cryptocurrencies. Below, we show you step by step how to buy TourCoin on PancakeSwap.

section_7.title: Information about TourCoin
section_7.p_1: Here you can see all the token information, transactions, and quotations.

section_9.title: Token Breakdown and Supplies
section_9.p_1: TourCoin is a utility and governance token designed to transform your travel experiences. With a maximum supply of 100,000,000 and an innovative token burn mechanism (TRC), TourCoin offers scarcity, stability, and community engagement. Join the financial tourism revolution with TourCoin, where every token is a step towards your dream journey.
section_9.p_2: The wallets 0xEEBF0956F0A9e1BB5920A487653a5B16cEE86856 (holding 77.77% of the tokens), and 0xe5b1f26989B7b6A518F2f783a890093Df7b78dC7 (holding 3.03% of the tokens) are locked and only release 0.64% and 0.16% of the total supply every 30 days.
